name: Edwin J. Wood
title: Strategic Technology & Product Innovation Leader
summary: Strategic technology and product innovation leader with 13+ years' experience translating data and platforms into audience-driving digital products. Defines multi-year roadmaps, aligns cross-functional teams, and drives measurable outcomes (KPIs, experiments, reliability) while enabling engineering excellence through cloud-native delivery and observability.

roles.title: Director of Software Development
bullets: Shifted teams to a product-led structure (pods / value streams) improving focus, accountability, and delivery cadence.
Established unified Jira / Azure DevOps taxonomy and dashboards to provide clear portfolio and execution visibility.
Introduced lifecycle from business case through benefits review to guide prioritization and reallocation.
Consolidated overlapping platforms (CRM, portal, ServiceNow, cloud) to reduce redundancy and fund modernization.
Embedded practical measurement (throughput, cycle time, service levels) into planning and review cadences.
Built capability taxonomy and progression model enhancing role clarity and internal advancement.
Partnered with executives and finance to sequence multi-year initiatives and integration work.
Led CRM consolidation, cloud migration, and portal modernization to improve scalability and customer experience.
Advanced CI/CD and observability practices accelerating safe, reliable releases.
Implemented OAuth2 and MFA to strengthen security and simplify access across platforms.

roles.title: Senior Manager / Manager of Software Development / Technical Lead
bullets: Led engineering teams for integrations, platform, and product initiatives that supported revenue and operational improvements.
Designed integration patterns and APIs connecting CRM, portals, and analytics systems to streamline data flow and telemetry.
